microservices.name: msa-httpbin
microservices.description: HTTP Request & Response Service. Useful for testing HTTP REST tools.

microservices.name: msa-faker
microservices.description: Fake data generator. Can generate names, addresses, phone numbers, etc.

microservices.name: msa-corpora
microservices.description: A collection of small corpuses of interesting data.

microservices.name: msa-world-factbook
microservices.description: Semi structured API for the CIA World Factbook, a reference of information for 267 countries.

microservices.name: msa-fakeimage
microservices.description: Dynamic image generator. Can generate png, jpg and gif images at various resolutions.

microservices.name: msa-string-similarity
microservices.description: Various algorithms to mesure the similarity of N strings.

microservices.name: msa-geohash
microservices.description: Base32 Geoashing as a service, with geojson support.

microservices.name: msa-geocoder
microservices.description: Reverse geocoding as a simple offline service.
